name: Scaring 9 to 5
description:
You are Harold, just your average monster who needs to make rent. Help him on his first job at a haunted house, where you can possess objects to scare whiny teenagers and gather those valuable screams.

Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 33 with the theme: You are the Monster.

We took this as an opportunity to test out some new tools; Adobe Fuse and ProCore Prototype

Controls:
LMB (Click): Activate Monster Scare
RMB (Drag): Move View
